aboutPreview.title: About Us
aboutPreview.description: European International Peace University (EIPU) is an innovative higher education institution dedicated to fostering peace through education and global understanding. We provide our students with the knowledge and skills necessary to make positive changes in the world.

statistics.subtitle: Building excellence through quality education and global partnerships

hero.title: About European International Peace University
hero.subtitle: Empowering minds, building peace, and shaping tomorrow's leaders through excellence in education and global collaboration.

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.subtitle: Committed to excellence, innovation, and global peace through education

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class education that empowers students to become ethical leaders, critical thinkers, and agents of positive change in their communities and beyond. We are dedicated to fostering peace, understanding, and collaboration across cultures and nations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading international university recognized for academic excellence, innovative research, and commitment to peace education. We envision a world where education bridges divides, creates understanding, and builds sustainable futures for all.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at EIPU

academicExcellence.title: Academic Excellence
academicExcellence.description: Rigorous academic programs designed to challenge and inspire students to achieve their full potential.

globalPerspective.title: Global Perspective
globalPerspective.description: Promoting international understanding and collaboration through diverse cultural experiences and global partnerships.

inclusiveCommunity.title: Inclusive Community
inclusiveCommunity.description: Building a welcoming environment where every student feels valued, respected, and empowered to succeed.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Encouraging creative thinking and cutting-edge research that addresses real-world challenges and drives progress.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Upholding the highest standards of ethical conduct, honesty, and accountability in all our endeavors.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for continuous improvement and setting benchmarks in education, research, and community service.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A journey of growth, excellence, and commitment to peace education

2020.title: Foundation
2020.description: European International Peace University was established with a vision to create a world-class institution dedicated to peace education and global citizenship.

2021.title: First Graduates
2021.description: We proudly celebrated our first graduating class, marking a significant milestone in our journey toward academic excellence.

2022.title: International Recognition
2022.description: EIPU received accreditation and established partnerships with leading universities worldwide, expanding our global reach.

2023.title: Expansion
2023.description: We expanded our programs and facilities, welcoming students from over 50 countries and strengthening our commitment to diversity.

profile.title: Rector's Profile
profile.positionValue: Rector of European International Peace University (EIPU)
profile.description: Prof. Dr. Serdar KORAL is an internationally respected academic, higher education leader, and advocate for peace-focused learning. With a career spanning more than two decades across multiple continents, he brings to the European International Peace University (EIPU) a unique blend of academic excellence, global vision, and a deep commitment to shaping the next generation of socially responsible leaders.
profile.qualifications: Dr. KORAL holds a Ph.D. in Political Science and International Relations, with specializations in peace and conflict studies, global diplomacy, and intercultural communication. He has held academic and administrative positions at renowned institutions in Europe, Central Asia, and the Middle East. His academic journey is marked by a consistent focus on promoting dialogue, critical thinking, and ethical leadership in higher education.

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome Message from the Rector
welcomeMessage.paragraph1: Welcome to our university! It is my great honor to greet you at the beginning of a new academic journey. Our institution is committed to providing a supportive, innovative, and inclusive environment where everyone can grow intellectually and personally.
welcomeMessage.paragraph2: We believe that education is not just about gaining knowledge, but also about developing critical thinking, creativity, and a sense of responsibility to society. As you embark on this journey, I encourage you to take full advantage of the opportunities available, engage actively with your community, and strive for excellence in all that you do.
welcomeMessage.paragraph3: Together, we will work towards building a brighter future through learning, research, and collaboration. I am confident that your time here will be both rewarding and inspiring.
welcomeMessage.closing: Wishing you success and fulfillment in your studies and beyond.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about fees, payments, and financial aid
faq.contact: Still have questions? We're here to help!

q1.question: What is included in the tuition fee?
q1.answer: Tuition fees include all academic courses, access to university facilities (library, laboratories, computer labs), student support services, and basic student activities. Additional fees may apply for specific programs, materials, or optional services.

q2.question: Can I pay my fees in installments?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans including semester payments, monthly installments (10 months), and custom payment schedules. Interest-free options are available for all installment plans. Contact our finance office for more details.

q3.question: Are there any additional fees?
q3.answer: Additional fees may include application fee, registration fee, student services fee, and specific program-related costs (materials, field trips, etc.). All fees are clearly outlined in your acceptance letter and student handbook.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept bank transfers, credit/debit cards, and online payment platforms. International students can also use wire transfers. Payment details and instructions will be provided upon enrollment.

q5.question: Can I get a refund if I withdraw?
q5.answer: Refund policies vary by program and timing of withdrawal. Generally, refunds are available within the first few weeks of the semester, with amounts decreasing over time. Full refund policies are outlined in your enrollment agreement.

q6.question: Are scholarships renewable?
q6.answer: Most scholarships are renewable annually based on maintaining academic performance (usually GPA 3.0 or higher), full-time enrollment, and good standing. Specific renewal requirements are outlined in your scholarship award letter.

q7.question: Can I apply for multiple scholarships?
q7.answer: Yes, you can apply for multiple scholarships. However, total financial aid (including scholarships, grants, and other aid) cannot exceed the total cost of attendance. We'll work with you to maximize your financial aid package.

q8.question: When are fees due?
q8.answer: Fee payment deadlines vary by payment plan. Full payment is due before the start of each semester. Semester payments are due at the beginning of each semester. Monthly installments begin in September and continue for 10 months. Specific dates are provided in your enrollment package.

q9.question: Do you offer discounts for early payment?
q9.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for full upfront payment and a 5% discount for semester payments. These discounts apply to tuition fees only and are available to all students. Contact us for more information about early payment discounts.

q10.question: What happens if I can't pay on time?
q10.answer: If you're experiencing financial difficulties, please contact our finance office immediately. We offer payment plan modifications, emergency assistance, and financial counseling. Late fees may apply if arrangements aren't made in advance.

hero.title: E-Library
hero.subtitle: Access trusted resources worldwide for academic research and learning. Get free access to open access databases, course materials, and academic publications.

resources.title: Open Access Resources
resources.subtitle: Curated trusted academic resources for our students and researchers
resources.footer: These resources provide free access to our students and researchers. All resources are open access and suitable for academic research.

ankuni.description: Access to academic resources from Ankara University, one of Turkey's oldest universities.

core.description: The world's largest collection of open access research articles.
